title: Introduction to Relationships and Families
description: This course provides an overview of couple, marital, and family relationships from a broad, interdisciplinary perspective.

title: Sexual Health and Well-Being
description: This course offers a theoretical and empirical examination of sexuality from a health perspective. Approaches to counselling, prevention, and treatment will be discussed. Topics may include sexually transmitted infections (STI) and pregnancy prevention, pregnancy and post-partum health, healthy romantic and sexual relationships, chronic and long-term illnesses, and sexual cancers.
